modName: Hack's Player Exclusive Eastern Swordsmanship Redone
summary: Player Exclusive Rework Animations from various mods to a single pack.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]Thanks to the detailed images uploaded by [b]Andysjunk[/b]! I really appreciate it!

[color=#d8d8d8]FIRST AND FOREMOST OF ALL, THESE ANIMATIONS ARE NOT MINE, IT IS FROM VARIOUS MODDERS ALONG WITH THEIR HARD WORK. THESE AMAZING MODDERS ARE ON THE CREDITS SECTION, HANDS DOWN TO THOSE GUYS![/color][/size][color=#d8d8d8]
[/color][size=5][color=#d8d8d8]SECOND IS, THIS ANIMATION PACK IS[/color] [/size][u][size=6]NOT LORE-FRIENDLY[/size][/u][size=5] [color=#cccccc]DUE TO THE STYLES.[/color][/size]
[size=5][u]NOT LORE FRIENDLY[/u] [color=#d8d8d8]MEANS IT WILL NOT[/color] [u]BLEND[/u] [color=#d8d8d8]TO THE NORDIC ESSENCE OF SKYRIM.[/color]

F[color=#d8d8d8]ile Updated!
here are the changes:
1.1 - added some Pretty Combat Animations by dualsun (male)
to blend w/ the pack.[/color]

[/size][b]
[color=#dbb0a7][size=6]*MAKE SURE YOU READ ALL BELOW BEFORE COMPLAINTS*[/size][/color]



[size=4]MOD DESCRIPTION:[/size][/b]

[size=3][color=#d8d8d8]THIS ANIMATION PACK HAS COMPLETE FEATURES THAT SHOWS HOW EASTERN SWORDSMANS USE THEIR FIGHTING STYLES IN COMBAT. EVERY WAVE OF SWORDS, THE ELEGANT MOVES AND THE ESSENCE OF THE SWORDS OF THE EAST.
SAMURAI STYLE!
THE PACK IS ACCORDING TO MY PLAY-STYLE AND I HAVE NO INTERESTS ON DEBATING WHY I UPLOADED IT.
(TO LORE FRIENDLY-ISH GUYS OUT THERE, UGH -_-)[/color]



[/size][size=4][b]CURRENT FEATURES:
[/b][/size][size=3]
[color=#d8d8d8]-PLAYER EXCLUSIVE ANIMATIONS powered by FNIS PCEA 2 by [b]fore[/b][/color][/size][color=#d8d8d8][size=4]
[/size][size=3]-COMPLETE SET OF ANIMATIONS (WALK, RUN, SHEATHE, UNSHEATHE, AND ATTACK ANIMATIONS.)
[/size][size=3]-LIGHT FOOT JUMP ANIMATION ADDON by [b]Spoiler[/b] [i](you can turn it off on MCM menu under FNIS PCEA2.)[/i]
[/size][size=3]-EXECUTIONER AXE/HAMMER/SPEAR IDLE by [b]tomtomsatnav1234
[/b]-SOME ANIMATIONS FROM THE PRETTY COMBAT ANIMATIONS by [b]dualsun[/b][/size]
[size=3]-NOW SUPPORTS NEXUS MOD MANAGER[/size][/color][size=4][b]
[/b][/size][b][size=3]

[/size][/b][b]
[size=4]FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS:

[/size][/b][color=#d8d8d8][b][size=3]"IS THIS ANIMATION PACK ALSO SUITED FOR FEMALES?"[/size][/b]
[size=3]* NO IT IS NOT, IT IS BEST SUITED FOR MALES ONLY, MALE RACES INCLUDED.[/size]
[size=3]BUT YOU CAN TRY AND SEE IF IT FITS, I AM CURRENTLY WORKING ON FEMALE ANIMATIONS.
[/size]

[size=3][b]"I DON'T LIKE THE ______ ANIMATION."[/b][/size]
[size=3]* WELL FOR ME IT SUITS MY PLAY-STYLE.
BUT! I CAN REMOVE CERTAIN THINGS AND UPLOAD IT ON A SEPARATE FILE.[/size]
[size=3]I HAVE LIMITED OPTIONS REGARDING ANIMATIONS AND I DON'T KNOW HOW TO MAKE ONE.
I WILL BE MAKING UPDATES SO STAY TUNED!
[/size]

[size=3][b]"MY CHARACTER SLIDES WHILE ATTACKING!"[/b][/size]
[size=3]* THAT IS NOT MY PROBLEM MATE, THIS PACK IS JUST A [/size][size=4][u]MIX-UP[/u][/size][size=3] OF ANIMATIONS BY D[/size][size=3]IFFERENT MODDERS.[/size]
YOU CAN ASK THE MODDERS OF THESE ANIMATIONS, SEE IF IT IS FIXED OR NOT.
I BROWSE NEXUS REGULARLY SO THERE WILL BE UPDATES IF THEY UPDATE FIXES.


[size=3][b]"MY CAPE IS STICKING TO MY FEET!"[/b]
*THIS PROBLEM IS THE WALK AND RUN ANIMATIONS BY [b]Seroux.[/b]
I USED [b][u]ILLOUSTRIOUS' HDT CLOAKS OF SKYRIM[/u][/b] AND I HAD NO PROBLEMS AT ALL.
(TUTORIAL ON TROUBLESHOOTING SECTION.)[/size]


[size=3][b]"WHAT IS WRONG WITH THE VIDEOS/SCREENSHOTS?"[/b][/size]
[size=3]* I PLAY SKYRIM RUNNING ON CORE I3 ONLY AND A SHARED VIDEO MEMORY (INTEL HD 3000)[/size]
[size=3]SO I SUFFER ON [b]FPS DROPS[/b], SOMETIMES I DIE IN BATTLE. [b]I AM NOT RICH[/b] BUT I WANT TO PLAY GAMES.[/size]
[size=3]I USED DIFFERENT MODS/TOOLS BUT THE ONLY THING I FOUND USEFUL IS THE [/size][u][b]TEOFIS[/b][/u][size=3] CONSOLE COMMAND,
[/size] [size=3]WHICH GIVES ME A [b]BOOST[/b] OF FPS.[/size]
[size=3]SORRY FOR LOW QUALITY.[/size]


[size=3][b]"WHAT SOFTWARE DID YOU USE TO TAKE VIDEOS/SCREENSHOTS?"[/b][/size]
[size=3]*THANKS TO THE COMMENTS SECTION FROM OUR FELLOW PLAYERS, I USED [b]FRAPS.[/b][/size][/color]


[size=4][b]KNOWN BUGS/GLITCHES:[/b][/size]
[color=#d8d8d8][size=3]-PLAYER SLIDING WHILE ATTACKING
-RUN/WALK BACKWARD ATTACK ANIMATIONS
-CAPE IS STUCK TO THE CHARACTER'S FEET WHILE WALKING/RUNNING.[/size]
[/color][size=3]
[/size]
[size=4][b]REQUIREMENTS:
[/b][/size]
[size=3]LATEST VERSION OF SKYUI, SKSE AND FORES NEW IDLES.[/size]



[size=4][b]INSTALLATION:[/b][/size]

[size=3][color=#cccccc]DOWNLOAD MY MOD FROM THE FILES TAB.

INSTALL. USE A MOD MANAGER THAT IS CAPABLE IN INSTALLING MODS. (DON'T DO IT MANUALLY)

AFTER INSTALLING,[/color] [u][b]RUN FORES NEW IDLES (FNIS)[/b][/u][color=#d8d8d8] OR NOTHING WILL WORK.

START SKSE, WAIT FOR A COUPLE OF MINUTES FOR THE FNIS PCEA2 WILL APPEAR ON THE MCM MENU.

AND YOU'RE DONE! GO AND ENJOY THE ANIMATIONS WHEN WIELDING SWORDS! (JUST DON'T KILL CHICKENS.)[/color]


[/size][b][size=4]UNINSTALLATION:[/size][/b]

[color=#d8d8d8][size=3]TURN OFF ANIMATIONS FROM FNIS PCEA2 UNDER MOD CONFIGURATION MENU, TICK REFRESH ANIMATIONS[/size]
[size=3]UNINSTALL USING MOD MANAGER, AND RUN FNIS AFTERWARDS[/size][/color]


[b][size=5]TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE/FIXES:[/size][/b]

[size=3][b]FOR THE CLOAKS WHEN STUCK ON FEET WHILE MOVING:

[/b][color=#d8d8d8]USE [b]HDT CLOAKS OF SKYRIM [/b]by [b]Illoustrious
[/b][/color][/size][color=#d8d8d8]* [size=3]I SUGGEST YOU GO AND DOWNLOAD THIS MOD IF YOU ARE FOND OF USING CLOAKS AND WANT TO [u][b]FIX THAT STICKY CAPE.[/b][/u][/size]
[size=3](REMEMBER THAT IT NEEDS THE MAIN AND ESP FILES OF [b]CLOAKS OF SKYRIM [/b]by [b]Noodles [/b]for it to work!)[/size]
[/color]
[size=3][b]IF THE ANIMATIONS ARE NOT WORKING/APPLIED, YOU NEED TO:
[/b]
[color=#d8d8d8]MAKE SURE YOU [/color][/size][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][u]RUN FNIS[/u][/size][size=3] AFTER INSTALLING, BECAUSE [b]FNIS PCEA 2[/b] [/size][size=4]REQUIRES[/size][size=3] FNIS TO BE RUN![/size]
[size=3]AFTER STARTING THE GAME, WAIT FOR A COUPLE OF SECONDS/MINUTES FOR THE FNIS PCEA 2 APPEAR ON MCM MENU.[/size]
[size=3]AGAIN DO NOT DO IT MANUALLY! LET A MOD MANAGER AND FNIS DO THE MAGIC![/size]
[/color]
[b][size=4]UPDATING/HOT FIXES:[/size]

[/b][color=#cccccc][size=3]CURRENTLY THERE ARE NO UPDATES FOR THE MOMENT, BUT IF THERE IS JUST DO WHAT I DO:[/size]
[size=3]UNINSTALL THE MOD, RUN FNIS.[/size]
[size=3]USE SAVE GAME CLEANERS IF EVER PROBLEM PERSISTS.[/size]
[size=3]DOWNLOAD A NEWLY UPDATED FILE FROM MY FILES TAB, INSTALL AND RUN FNIS.[/size]
[/color]

[size=4][b]CREDITS:

[/b][/size][color=#d8d8d8]PRETTY COMBAT ANIMATIONS by [/color][b][size=4]Dualsun[/size][/b]
[color=#d8d8d8]2-HAND SWORD COMBAT ANIMATIONS by [/color][b][size=4]Mofumofu[/size][/b]
[color=#d8d8d8]SEPIROTH ANIMATIONS by [/color][b][size=4]Seroux[/size][/b]
[color=#d8d8d8]ORIENTAL SWORDSMANSHIP OF EAST ASIA and WOLF SKILL ANIMATIONS by [/color][b][size=4]Cyh0405[/size][/b]
[color=#d8d8d8]MYSTIC KNIGHT and ZWEIHANDER ANIMATIONS by [/color][b][size=4]Yukl[/size][/b]
[color=#d8d8d8]EXECUTIONER AXE IDLE by [/color][b][size=4]Tomtonsatnav1234[/size][/b]
[color=#d8d8d8]FORES NEW IDLES and FNIS PCEA2 by [/color][b][size=4]Fore[/size]
[/b][color=#d8d8d8]CLOAKS OF SKYRIM[/color][b] [/b][color=#d8d8d8]by[/color][b] [/b][b][size=4]Noodles[/size][/b]
[color=#d8d8d8]HDT CLOAKS OF SKYRIM[/color][b] [/b][color=#d8d8d8]by[/color][b] [/b][b][size=4]Illoustrious[/size][/b]


[/center]
author: HackLINK

files.name: Hack's Custom Animation Pack w PCA anim and sneaks
